SELECT u.id, u.*, ur.score, uc.fighters fighters FROM user_rank ur INNER JOIN user u on u.id = ur.user_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(fighter_no) AS fighters FROM user_fighter WHERE quarter = #{ro.quarter} AND total >= 5 GROUP BY user_id )uc ON u.id = uc.user_id
fighters like concat('%',#{ro.fighterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and ur.quarter = #{ro.quarter}
ORDER BY ur.score DESC
